= bbb-conf =

bbb-conf is a tool used to manage !BigBlueButton servers.

== Options ==

=== --help ===
    Prints the help message.

=== --version ===
    Display the BigBlueButton version.

=== --setip host ===
    Set IP/Hostname for BigBlueButton's configuration.

=== --check ===
    Check current settings.

=== --conference [konference|meetme] ===
    Switch conference module in Asterisk.

=== --debug ===
    Check the log files for errors

=== --setup-samba ===
    Setup samba share for development (VM only)

=== --setup-dev [bbb-web|bbb-client|bbb-apps] ===
    Setup the development environment.

=== --reset-dev ===
    Reset the environment back to using packages

=== --watch ===
    Watch log files for error messages every 2 seconds

=== --zip ===
    Zip up log files for reporting an error
